title: Arabian Opulence in Bahrain with Lagoon Views, Onsite Dining, Infinity Pool & Spa
description:
Just steps from Bahrain International Airport and a mere 10 minutes from Manama’s vibrant city centre, this five-star sanctuary is where European elegance meets rich Arabian heritage. This hotel is celebrated for its award-winning culinary experiences, from the renowned Mövenpick Brunch to its indulgent theme nights.

Home to the prestigious Rimal Spa, a haven of tranquility with opulent treatment rooms and traditional Turkish hammams, this Green Globe Certified hotel redefines luxury. Consistently voted among the best airport hotels in the Middle East, the hotel welcomes guests with impeccable Swiss hospitality, lagoon views, and exclusive amenities-making it the ultimate gateway to Bahrain’s warm spirit and sophistication.
